SELECT s.name,COUNT(o.id) setmeal_count,COUNT(o.id)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_order) proportion FROM t_setmeal s INNER JOIN t_order o WHERE s.id = o.setmeal_id GROUP BY s.name ORDER BY setmeal_count DESC LIMIT 0,4
